Package net.happybrackets.rendererengine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GranularRenderer
    This render allows you to: load up a database of sounds choose a sound to play choose whether that sound is granular or straight
    Renderer
    Renderer is the base class to be used when developing a sketch that runs a synchronized composition using Sound and Lights The Renderer class needs to be extended by the sketch that will be sent to the devices.
    RendererController
    The RendererController manages the instantiated Renderer in the device.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Renderer.ColorMode  
    Renderer.Type  
    RendererController.EightLEDsMode
    In the RendererController you can choose the mode of operation to work with the Biotica Media Pixel Firmware.
    RendererController.RenderMode  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HBCommand
    Annotation that defines a generic method that will be exposed via OSC.
    HBNumberRange
    Annotation that defines a numeric field that will be exposed via OSC.
    HBParam
    Annotation that defines a generic field (number or string) that will be exposed via OSC.
